conduct:
(:action conduct_initiation
    :parameters (?p1 - person ?p2 - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (initiated ?p1))
                    (not (initiated ?p2)))
    :effect (and
              (initiated ?p1)
              (initiated ?p2))
)

;; Action 2: Meet in Secret
meet:
(:action meet_in_secret
    :parameters (?p - person ?l - location)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?p)
                    (not (meeting_location ?l)))
    :effect (meeting_location ?l)
)

;; Action 3: Remove Player
remove:
(:action remove_player
    :parameters (?p - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (member ?p)
                    (bad_for_group ?p))
    :effect (not (member ?p))
)

;; Action 4: Set Dress Code
set:
(:action set_dress_code
    :parameters (?c - dress_code)
    :precondition (not (dress_code_set))
    :effect (dress_code_set ?c)
)

;; Action 5: Initiate New Member
(:action set_meeting_place
    :parameters (?p - place ?c - cult)
    :precondition (and
                    (founders-initiated ?c)
                    (not (meeting-place-set ?p ?c)))
    :effect (meeting-place-set ?p ?c)
)
```

#### Action 3: Establish_dress_code
```lisp
initiate:
(:action initiate_new_member
    :parameters (?p - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?p1)
                    (initiated ?p2)
                    (not (member ?p))
                    (brilliant ?p)
                    (enthusiastic ?p))
    :effect (member ?p)
)

;; Action 6: Think of a Name
(:action initiate_founders
    :parameters (?p1 - person ?p2 - person ?c - cult)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (founders-initiated ?c))
                    (not (in-cult ?p1 ?c))
                    (not (in-cult ?p2 ?c)))
    :effect (and
              (founders-initiated ?c)
              (in-cult ?p1 ?c)
              (in-cult ?p2 ?c))
)
```

#### Action 2: Set_meeting_place
```lisp
(:action initiate_new_members
    :parameters (?p - person ?c - cult)
    :precondition (and
                    (founders-initiated ?c)
                    (meeting-place-set ?p ?c)
                    (not (in-cult ?p ?c))
                    (member-count ?c ?n)
                    (< ?n 10))
    :effect (and
              (in-cult ?p ?c)
              (increase-member-count ?c))
)
```

#### Action 5: Name_the_cult
```lisp
think:
(:action think_of_name
    :parameters (?p1 - person ?p2 - person ?n - name)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?p1)
                    (initiated ?p2)
                    (not (society_named)))
    :effect (society_named ?n)
)

;; Action 7: Create Secret Mission
(:action name_the_cult
    :parameters (?c - cult ?n - name)
    :precondition (and
                    (founders-initiated ?c)
                    (not (cult-named ?c)))
    :effect (cult-named ?c ?n)
)
```

#### Action 6: Create_secret_mission
```lisp
create:
(:action create_secret_mission
    :parameters (?c - cult ?m - mission)
    :precondition (and
                    (founders-initiated ?c)
                    (not (secret-mission-set ?c)))
    :effect (secret-mission-set ?c ?m)
)
```

These actions capture the primary steps of establishing a secret society or cult as described in the task. Each action is designed with preconditions and effects that reflect the logical sequence and requirements of the task.
read:
(:action read_background_information
    :parameters (?p - person ?b - book)
    :precondition (and
                    (initiated ?p)
                    (not (read ?p ?b)))
    :effect (read ?p ?b)
)
```

These actions represent the steps and descriptions provided, ensuring that the conditions and effects align with the goal of removing players if necessary and maintaining the integrity of the secret society.
